[ The ECLiPSe Built-In Predicates | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

Directives

Directives that can only appear in compiled files

Predicates

comment(+Type, +Information)
Adding documentational information to ECLiPSe files.
include(+FileSpec)
Include other files for compilation.
pragma(Option)
Enable or disable compiler options. Can only be used as a directive in source files.
